div.div:
The User has to handle managing devices themselves, the Driver only checks whether an address is currently in use.
This includes the potential creation of a broadcast device.
The user should be informed if they attempt to register a device with a previously defined address.

switch.text: The User has to handle managing d...

div.div: The User has to define their own device types and manage them accordingly with the correct Register Mapping. This includes a potential Broadcast Device.
